section.p:
This template represents planned immunizations. Planned Immunization Activity is very similar to Planned Medication Activity with some key differences, for example, the drug code system is constrained to CVX codes.
The priority of the immunization activity to the patient and provider is communicated through Priority Preference. The effectiveTime indicates the time when the immunization activity is intended to take place and authorTime indicates when the documentation of the plan occurred.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-32098, CONF:1098-32099 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.120"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SBADM" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1098-32091)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Planned moodCode (SubstanceAdministration/Supply) 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.24 STATIC 2014-09-01 (CONF:1098-32097)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1098-32100)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-32101)/@code="active" Active (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1098-32102)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1098-32103)
The effectiveTime in a planned immunization activity represents the time that the immunization activity should occur.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] repeatNumber (CONF:1098-32126)
In a Planned Immunization Activity, repeatNumber defines the number of allowed administrations. For example, a repeatNumber of "3" means that the substance can be administered up to 3 times.
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] routeCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Medication Route FDA Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.7 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-32127)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] approachSiteCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Body Site 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-32128)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] doseQuantity (CONF:1098-32129)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consumable such that it (CONF:1098-32131)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedProduct, where its type is Immunization Medication Information2 (CONF:1098-32132)

MAY contain [0..*] performer such that it (CONF:1098-32104)
The clinician who is expected to perform the planned immunization activity could be identified using substanceAdministration/performer.
Conforms to Performer2 from CDA

MAY contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-32105)
The author in a planned immunization activity represents the clinician who is requesting or planning the immunization activity.
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-32108, CONF:1098-32109, CONF:1098-32110)
The following entryRelationship represents the priority that a patient or a provider places on the immunization activity.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Priority Preference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.143)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-32114, CONF:1098-32115, CONF:1098-32116)
The following entryRelationship represents the indication for the immunization activity.
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Conforms to Indication2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19:2014-06-09)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-32117, CONF:1098-32118, CONF:1098-32119)
The following entryRelationship captures any instructions associated with the planned immunization activity.
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Instruction2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20:2014-06-09)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] precondition such that it (CONF:1098-32123)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="PRCN" (CONF:1098-32124)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] criterion, where its type is Precondition For Substance Administration2 (CONF:1098-32125)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SBADM" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1098-32091)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Planned moodCode (SubstanceAdministration/Supply) 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.24 STATIC 2014-09-01 (CONF:1098-32097)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1098-32100)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-32101)/@code="active" Active (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1098-32102)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1098-32103)
The effectiveTime in a planned immunization activity represents the time that the immunization activity should occur.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] repeatNumber (CONF:1098-32126)
In a Planned Immunization Activity, repeatNumber defines the number of allowed administrations. For example, a repeatNumber of "3" means that the substance can be administered up to 3 times.
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] routeCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Medication Route FDA Value Set 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.7 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-32127)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] approachSiteCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Body Site 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.3221.8.9 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-32128)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] doseQuantity (CONF:1098-32129)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] consumable such that it (CONF:1098-32131)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] manufacturedProduct, where its type is Immunization Medication Information2 (CONF:1098-32132)

MAY contain [0..*] performer such that it (CONF:1098-32104)
Conforms to Performer2 from CDA
The clinician who is expected to perform the planned immunization activity could be identified using substanceAdministration/performer.

MAY contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-32105)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)
The author in a planned immunization activity represents the clinician who is requesting or planning the immunization activity.

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-32108, CONF:1098-32109, CONF:1098-32110)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Conforms to Priority Preference (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.143)
The following entryRelationship represents the priority that a patient or a provider places on the immunization activity.

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-32114, CONF:1098-32115, CONF:1098-32116)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Conforms to Indication2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19:2014-06-09)
The following entryRelationship represents the indication for the immunization activity.

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-32117, CONF:1098-32118, CONF:1098-32119)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Instruction2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20:2014-06-09)
The following entryRelationship captures any instructions associated with the planned immunization activity.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] precondition such that it (CONF:1098-32123)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="PRCN" (CONF:1098-32124)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] criterion, where its type is Precondition For Substance Administration2 (CONF:1098-32125)
